newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian TV says one body found is Eefje Lambrecks.
newsitem.headline: Belgian TV says one body found is Eefje Lambrecks.

text.p: Belgian television said one of two bodies found on Tuesday in the nation's child sex scandal was that of Eefje Lambrecks, abducted by Marc Dutroux a year ago.
"A very good source has told us one of the bodies is that of Eefje," RTL television reported.
The television said pathologists examining the corpses in Charleroi's Civic hospital were very close to identifying the second body.
Eefje Lambrecks, 19, and her friend An Marchal, 17, disappeared on August 22 last year in the Belgian port of Ostend.

The bodies were found on Tuesday under a shed in the garden of a house owned by Dutroux in the Jumet suburb of the southern city of Charleroi. The house was formerly occupied by Dutroux accomplice, Frenchman Bernard Weinstein.

Dutroux has admitted kidnapping them with Weinstein, whom he said he killed. The bodies of eight-year-olds Julie Lejeune and Melissa Russo were found two and a half weeks ago buried in another of Dutroux' six properties in the region. Two other young girls were rescued from a basement dungeon in another Dutroux house.
